nodes.text: Arna Selznick is a storyboard artist and supervisor, layout artist, director and writer for animated television series and film. Selznick began her career as a layout artist for the seminal Nelvana film Rock & Rule. She is known as one of only four women to have directed a full-length animated feature, having directed Nelvana's The Care Bears Movie, as well as the television or direct-to-video features Strawberry Shortcake and the Baby Without a Name and Back to School with Franklin. Selznick's extensive storyboard artwork credits include installments of series such as Miss Spider's Sunny Patch Friends, Clone High, Doug, Beetlejuice and Babar.
For Star Wars, Selznick served as storyboard supervisor for the entirety of Star Wars Droids: The Adventures of R2-D2 and C-3PO and for the first season of Ewoks.
Star Wars: Droids: The Adventures of R2-D2 and C-3PO
